scripts.build:gh-pages: ng build --configuration production --aot --ssr=false && echo 'Build completed' && ls -la dist/ && echo 'Checking siceap folder' && ls -la dist/demo/ && echo 'Removing docs' && rm -rf docs && echo 'Creating docs' && mkdir -p docs && echo 'Copying files' && cp -r dist/demo/browser/* docs/ && echo 'Done!'
